fight back.translation[0].definitions[0]: to work hard to achieve or oppose something, especially in a situation where you are losing
United fought back and scored a last-minute goal.
She was fighting back against the cancer.
fight back.translation[0].definitions[1]: to use violence or arguments against someone who has attacked you or argued with you
fight back.translation[0].definitions[2]: to try hard not to have or show a feeling
She looked away, fighting back her tears.
He fought back the impulse to slap her.
